title: Case Studies
text: Below are couple of case studies done recently for some of our clients.

section.title: A global fintech company. Inefficient CI/CD processes.
section.content: Implemented automated pipelines with Jenkins and Kubernetes. Reduced deployment times by 60%.

section.title: A Pharma company. Sync Drug Safety Info.
section.content: Implemented a whole new system to sync Drug Safety Info and provided transperancy to business.
